summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 29th Avenue West and 30th Avenue West, each from Elmore Street to Emerson Street, by constructing watermains and fire hydrants, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 92873 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
